item.title: Drifting Card Algorithm
item.description: .entry-content::after { /* keep floating content in flow, have div respond */ content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } #demo { display: inline; float: right; } Aim: To have cards drift to a predefined grid point while under the criteria of: Have no crossing paths

item.title: Teem, "Tiamat's" Signmaker
item.description: console.log("hi") Teem2’7” ; 31lbs ; NG Str→11Dex→18Con→16Int→10Wis→14Cha→16var containerWidth = packContainer(evenedMinSumWidthPacker); document.currentScript.parentElement.setAttribute("style","width:"+containerWidth+"px;"); PersuasionDeceptionInvestigationSurvivaldocument.currentScript.parentElement.setAttribute("style","width:"+packContainer(evenedMinSumWidthPacker)+"px;"); CommonDraconicGoblindocument.currentScript.parentElement.setAttribute("style","width:"+packContainer(evenedMinSumWidthPacker)+"px;"); Painters Suppliesdocument.currentScript.parentElement.setAttribute("style","width:"+packContainer(evenedMinSumWidthPacker)+"px;"); PrestidigitationFrostbiteFaerie FireSleepdocument.currentScript.parentElement.setAttribute("style","width:"+packContainer(evenedMinSumWidthPacker)+"px;"); Teem started life in a cold war, his tribe driven far beneath the earth. When his tribe was gifted a reincarnation of Tiamat - Dogmak, the languid - they lashed out with religious vigor to protect her. Near the surface again, Teem built signs no longer tricking Goblin scouts, but instead helping pilgrims traveling to Dogmaks birth-site.

item.title: Resume
item.description: .entry-content::after { /* keep floating content in flow, have div respond */ content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } .entry-content ul { list-style-type: circle; } .entry-content p { margin: 0px; } .entry-content h1, .entry-content h2, .entry-content h3, .entry-content h4, .entry-content h5, .entry-content h6 ::after { margin-top: 0px; font-size: 1em; } h3, h4, h5, h6 { display: inline; } .important { font-weight: bold; } .subtext { font-style: italic; } .right { display: inline; float: right; } .
